School Manager

Privacy Policy

Last updated: February 13, 2026

1. Introduction

School Manager ("we", "our", "us") is a multi-school management platform designed for nursery and primary schools. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our web application or mobile application (collectively, the "Service").

By using the Service, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.

2. Information We Collect

We collect the following types of information:

  • Account Information: Name, email address, phone number, and password when you register a school or create a user account.
  • School Information: School name, address, district, region, country, motto, email, phone, and badge/logo images.
  • Student Information: Name, date of birth, gender, class, parent/guardian details, medical information (blood group, allergies, disabilities), previous school, enrollment details, and photos.
  • Teacher Information: Name, email, phone, qualifications, class and subject assignments, and profile photos.
  • Parent/Guardian Information: Name, email, phone, relationship to student, and profile photos.
  • Academic Records: Attendance records, assessment scores, report cards, and fee payment records.
  • Usage Data: Login timestamps, device information, and app usage patterns for service improvement.
  • Payment Information: Subscription plan details and payment transaction IDs. We do NOT store credit card numbers — payments are processed securely by PesaPal.

3. How We Use Your Information

We use the collected information to:

  • Provide, operate, and maintain the school management Service
  • Manage student enrollment, attendance, assessments, and fee records
  • Enable communication between school administrators, teachers, and parents
  • Process subscription payments and manage billing
  • Send notifications and announcements within the platform
  • Generate academic reports, attendance records, and financial summaries
  • Improve and optimize the Service
  • Provide customer support

4. Data Storage and Security

Your data is stored securely on our servers with the following protections:

  • All data is transmitted over encrypted HTTPS connections
  • Passwords are hashed using industry-standard bcrypt encryption
  • Authentication uses secure JWT tokens with automatic expiration
  • Each school's data is isolated and accessible only by authorized users of that school
  • Regular database backups are maintained
  • Uploaded files (photos, badges) are stored securely on our servers

5. Data Sharing and Disclosure

We do NOT sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share information only in the following circumstances:

  • Within a school: School administrators, teachers, and parents can access student data relevant to their role within the same school
  • Payment processing: Payment data is shared with PesaPal for subscription processing
  • Legal compliance: When required by law, court order, or government regulation
  • Service protection: To protect the rights, property, or safety of our users and the Service

6. Data Retention

We retain your data for as long as your school account is active. When a school account is deactivated or deleted:

  • User accounts are soft-deleted (marked inactive) to preserve data integrity
  • Data may be retained for up to 90 days after account deletion for backup purposes
  • After the retention period, data is permanently removed from our systems

7. Offline Data Storage

Our application supports offline functionality. When using the app offline:

  • Data is cached locally on your device using browser storage (IndexedDB)
  • Changes made offline are synchronized with our servers when connectivity is restored
  • Local data is cleared when you log out
  • You can manage or clear local data through your browser settings

8. Children's Privacy

The Service manages information about children (students). This data is collected and managed by authorized school administrators and teachers, not directly from children. Schools using our Service are responsible for obtaining appropriate consent from parents or guardians for the collection and use of their children's information.

9. Your Rights

You have the right to:

  • Access: Request a copy of the personal data we hold about you
  • Correction: Request correction of inaccurate personal data
  • Deletion: Request deletion of your personal data (subject to legal obligations)
  • Export: Export your school data in standard formats (PDF, Excel)
  • Opt-out: Opt out of non-essential communications

To exercise any of these rights, contact us at the email below.

10. Third-Party Services

Our Service integrates with the following third-party services:

  • PesaPal: For payment processing (see PesaPal Privacy Policy)
  • Google Fonts: For web typography

11. Changes to This Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date. Continued use of the Service after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

12. Contact Us

If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at:

  • Email: support@yourdomain.com
  • Website: https://yourdomain.com
